alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Jackson; Mellette; Todd (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 11:42PM MDT until June 24 at 12:15AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM MDT/115 AM CDT/ FOR TODD...MELLETTE...SOUTHEASTERN JACKSON AND BENNETT COUNTIES... At 1142 PM MDT/1242 AM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles south of Intersection of Highway 83 and White River to 4 miles southeast of Parmelee to 3 miles northwest of Lacreek Wildlife Refuge, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... White River, Parmelee, Soldier Creek, Grass Mountain, Swift Bear, He Dog, Rosebud, Two Strike, Ring Thunder, Horse Creek, Saint Francis, Fairgrounds Housing, Wood, Butte Creek, Lakeview, Mosher and Okreek. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM MDT/300 AM CDT/ for south central South Dakota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
